column4: trying to get kdevelop and I get this error in synaptic: W: Failed to fetch http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/a/automake/automake1.4_1.4-p6-8_all.deb   ---  MD5Sum mismatch
topic
To switch to a working mirror type the following:  sudo sed -e 's/us.archive/archive/' -i /etc/apt/sources.list && sudo apt-get update
you don;t need to go to #kubuntu
the us ubuntu mirror is down
To switch to a working mirror type the following:  sudo sed -e 's/us.archive/archive/' -i /etc/apt/sources.list && sudo apt-get update
look at debfoster
if you install things using aptitude, all dependencies will be removed when uninstalling
I use the synaptic manager
maybe synaptic does it too, i don't know it :)
synaptic has two remove options, mark for removal, and mark for complete removal... could it be the later?
no
install openssh-server
openssh-server is sshd..
dns server settings are managed by dhclient, and that can screw up things for you
as root, edit /etc/dhcp3/dhclient.conf
nothing in there that I can do... I'll check resolv.conf
set the ouypuy plugin of XMMS to esound :)
damn you! worked like MAGIC !! w00t!
:D
fam is obsolete
thanks a lot. I'm writing a program, so do you think many distros are using gamin ?
afaik the API is the same
thanks ... you're right... quote: "Basically it is exactly like for using the fam interface. From a programmer point of view this is the same API."
